en: Don't trust them.
The night was invented by the government to keep people obedient. Have you ever noticed that babies keep awake at night? It's because they haven't been indocrinated
pt: A noite e uma invencao do governo para deixar a populacao mais obediente. Você ja percebeu que os bebes nao dormem de noite? E porque eles ainda nao foram doutrinados

en: The green guys, you know? People think they are goblins. But I'm telling you, they are not. You know what they truly are?
pt: Sabe aqueles carinhas verdes? Todo mundo acha que eles sao goblins. Mas a verdade e que eles nao sao. Sabe o que eles sao de verdade?

en: The goblins are aliens. You heard it right. Aliens. A - L - I - E - N - S. And they were sent here to screw us up. So we screw them up first.
pt: Os goblins sao aliens. Exatamente, aliens. A - L - I - E - N - S. E eles estao aqui para acabar com a gente. Mas nao se a gente acabar com eles primeiro.

en: Earth is flat. Just like a plate.
pt: A Terra e plana. Sim que nem um prato.

en: EscaMedia is just your regular communication company. What are you even looking for? It's just birbs and mails.
pt: A EscaMedia e uma empresa normal de comunicacoes. O que voces estao tentando achar aqui? Temos apenas pombos-correio e nada mais

en: Art thou prepared for the witch hunting in the blessed day after the blessed day of tomorrow?
pt: Estais vois devidamente preparados para a caca as bruxas depois de amanha?

en: Escamedia officialy repudiates any form of untruthful statements or phrasery. In another words, we don't walk around with fakies.
pt: Nos da EscaMedia sempre incentivamos a disseminação da verdade e somos extremamente contra noticias falsas.

en: I swear to God i saw an undead last night. I'm telling you.
pt: Eu juro que vi um morto-vivo ontem de noite! EU JURO!

en: I recently tried to speak to a goblin. But these guys are such a bunch of weirdos. It's like they never learned to talk.
pt: Esses dias eu tentei conversar com um goblin, mas eles sao muito estranhos parecem que nao sabem falar normalmente.

en: Earth is definitely not flat. Stick with me, it's actually hollow. Like a knight's armour on a castle.
pt: A Terra não e plana, ela na verdade e oca, entao nao tem como ser plana.

en: The moon is made out of cheese. And one day the Sun is going to get close enough to melt it.
pt: A lua é feita de queijo. E um dia o Sol ainda vai derreter ela.

en: My uncle is the best. The guy got 15 natural monsters from nature in the last night of fishing. If only was just as cool as he is...
pt: Meu tio foi pescar e matou 15 monstros marinhos ontem. Cara como eu queria ser legal como ele...

en: Snark Ssssssberg is an alien. He is also a reptlian (it comes from reptile, I know I'm really smart). He is from a very advanced world.
pt: Snark Ssssssberg e um alienígena reptiliano vindo de um planeta muito avançado.

en: Cigarettes are made in Ssssssnark's home planet and sold here. But this is top-secret, noone told it to you.
pt: O cigarro e uma droga feita no planeta natal de Snark e e vendido, no reino, secretamente por ele.

en: I heard carrier pigeons are robots, whatever that means. They are made to control the means of communication.
pt: Os pombos-correio sao robos desenvolvidos pela EscaMedia para controlar a comunicacao do reino.

en: Goblins are HUMAN. Just like you, just like me. Imagine going green, that's so 1437. But they used the CiGaReTtE. It's what it does to people. It gets you green.
pt: Os goblins sao seres humanos, isso mesmo, eles nao sao uma especie escondida que nao havia sido encontrada. Eles sao seres humanos que fumaram muito cigarro e foram transformados naqueles serezinhos verdes.

en: Earth is not round like a ball. Neither hollow like a knight. It's Bowl-shaped. Just like a bowl.
pt: A terra nao e plana, nao e oca, e uma cumbuca.
